tests.title: Webpage loads successfully
tests.fullTitle: Verify the webpage loads successfully Webpage loads successfully

tests.title: Has the lang attribute set to en

suites.title: Verify the chatbot elements are displayed correctly

tests.title: Chatbot window opens on click
tests.fullTitle: Verify the chatbot elements are displayed correctly Chatbot window opens on click
tests.code:
const WebPage = new _webPageElements.webPage();
WebPage.clickOnChatbot().closeChatbot();

tests.title: Verify the webchat headers
tests.fullTitle: Verify the chatbot elements are displayed correctly Verify the webchat headers
tests.code:
const WebPage = new _webPageElements.webPage();
WebPage.clickOnChatbot().verifyAvatar().verifyHeaders().verifyChatShare().closeChatbot();

tests.title: Verify the webchat body
tests.fullTitle: Verify the chatbot elements are displayed correctly Verify the webchat body
tests.code:
const WebPage = new _webPageElements.webPage();
WebPage.verifyChatBody().closeChatbot();

tests.title: Verify the webchat form
tests.fullTitle: Verify the chatbot elements are displayed correctly Verify the webchat form
tests.code:
const WebPage = new _webPageElements.webPage();
WebPage.verifyChatBody().closeChatbot();
